description: Bring your power drill to your base tuning chores and get the job done fast. The Spin Handle lets you change brushes and rollers without removing the hex drive from the drill.Handle features all metal construction and a 1.25in. sealed cartridge bearing for smooth rotation.Brushes and rollers can be changed without removing the hex drive from the drill chuck.Compatible with all Tools4Boards brushes and rollers (not included with this style).
name: Tools4Boards Spin Handle+Hex
